alert.note: Alert for Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Livingston Parish through 600 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Livingston, or 10 miles northeast of Denham Springs. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denham Springs, Walker, Livingston and French Settlement. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 13 and 30. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
